name: portfolio_website
description: a website to show off some projects of mine

scripts.start: eleventy --serve & npx tailwindcss -i src/css/tailwind.css -c src/css/tailwind.config.js -o public/css/style.css --watch
scripts.build: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true eleventy && NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -i src/css/tailwind.css -c src/css/tailwind.config.js -o public/css/style.css --minify
